title: Juda maicham chunga
lyrics:
Juda maicham chunga,
Ran thisen luang tawh chuan,
Rilru a thlamuan zo lo va,
Sual kai a tibo nang.

Van Beramno zet hian,
Ka sual zawng a kalpui,
Krista inthawina thisen chuan,
Sual ser a tireh thei.

I hmaah inchhirin,
Ka rinna kut phar hi,
I lu chhip hluah lo dahin,
Thupha ka chawi a ni.

Rin hian kraws lam a hawi,
A en i phurrit chu;
Chu telah chuan ka sual i chawi,
A hmu - ka Tlantu duh.

Chutichuan, ka Lalpa,
Chawimawina zawng zawngte,
I ta ni rawh se - chatuana
I bawih ka lo ni e.
